The site displays code with examples named basic html code, add some control, wire up backend, and create components. Such samples add js and css to the html to include style and functionality. In the main sites, users can view code on Githib and access the download file. To build an application using Angular, developers can practice in a browser at no cost.

Name: Bottle
Desc: Bottle is a Python Web Framework. With Bottle users can request calls, receive support for mako, jinja2 and cheetah templates. They can also access services to create data, upload files, cookies and headers. Bottle is built in HTTP and is supported with Google App Engine and WSGI servers.

Name: Restify
Desc: restify is a small framework that borrows from express, used to build RESTful web services in Node.js. It provides out of the box support for features used to build such services such as versioning, error handling, content negotiation and CORS.

Name: Hapi
Desc: Hapi is a server framework for Node.js originally created by Walmart Labs. It is designed as a scalable web framework that can help developers evolve their system over time. Hapi offers REST API support and infrastructure for building web apps or serving static content.

Name: Express
Desc: Express is a minimal node.js web application framework. It offers developers a full set of features for building single, multi-page, and hybrid web applications. Express is styled after Sinatra.

Name: Cloudmade Nav SDK
Desc: The Nav SDK by Cloudmade is designed for developers to implement customizable tools into mobile devices for use in automobile navigation. Developed from the ground up, the Nav SDK supports multiple software platforms, compatible with Linux, QNX, Android, iOS, WinCE, and Windows Phone. The SDK is flexible enough to be implemented into various hardware platforms such as wearables, smartphone, and a car's dashboard control panel. Integrating 3rd party APIs for data sources is possible, and the SDK comes compatible with all major map providers. Some main features this hybrid offline/online SDK specializes in is route calculating, re-routing, voice control, and displaying traffic data.

Name: Giotto
Desc: Giotto is a framework based on the model, view and controllers (MVC) concept. Some of the characteristics of Giotto include a free RESTful interface, automatic URL routing, and Jinja2 for HTML templates with an API. This framework promotes functionality while the code for model, view, and controller is separated from an existing association.

Name: Tornado
Desc: Tornado is a framework developed at FriendFeed, a feed created with friends' news, articles, photos and videos and shared in multiple collaborative sites. With Tornado, users can access applications, websockets, and long polling code. This service is optimum for consumers who require lasting connections. The framework serves also as an asynchronous networking library.

Name: easyXDM Framework
Desc: easyXDM is a JavaScript framework that enables easy cross-domain messaging and JavaScript API exposure. It is a nearly independent framework written with light and flexible code. The framework allows the ability to transfer strings between two windows, termed a 'provider' and a 'consumer.' easyXDM works well with low latency on the following browsers: IE, Opera, Firefox, Safari, and Chrome.

Name: Grape
Desc: Grape is a RESTful micro-framework that allows developers to build simple APIs in Ruby. With built in support for conventions and versioning, it's simplicity makes it an alternative to using a large framework such as Rails. Grape is designed with DSL to compliment existing web applications with an easy to implement API.

Name: Zillow API in Cake
Desc: Zillow API in Cake allows developers to access the Zillow API using the CakePHP development framework. This framework is designed to help PHP users of all skill levels quickly develop applications.

Name: Fastuc
Desc: The very first Hacklang framework. It takes the best of the language and bring it to your applications: safety, speed and verboseness.

Name: FMEngine
Desc: FMEngine is an Objective-C framework created for the Last.fm API. The framework doesn't parse output from the Last.fm API, so users will need to use their own parsers. FMEngine can be used in iPhone and Mac OS X applications and is released under the MIT License.

Name: Flickraw
Desc: Flickraw is a Ruby library that provides an interface to the Flickr API. Data returned through the interface is presented in a simple and intuitive manner. Because the library's methods are fetched from Flickr when it loads, the library is always up-to-date.

Name: PRINTR3D PHP Wrapper
Desc: The PRINTR3D PHP Wrapper is designed to allow developers to easily integrate their PHP web applications with the Printr REST API's 3D printing services. This wrapper is being actively developed and updated by PRINTR.

Name: lastfm-sharp
Desc: lastfm-sharp is an open-source .NET interface to the Last.fm API. It comes with proxy support and is fully compatible with the .Net Framework and Mono.

Name: FlickrKit
Desc: FlickrKit is a library written in iOS Objective-C to help developers access the Flickr API. It is currently used by the Galleryr Pro iPad app.The library requires iOS 6.0 or above and has not been tested with older iOS versions.

Name: ObjectiveFlickr
Desc: ObjectiveFlickr is a framework for implementing the Flickr API in Objective-C. ObjectiveFlickr was designed for use in Mac and iPhone applications, but since it was developed for iOS 2.0, it may require some updates to match the current iOS version.

Name: OpenBR
Desc: The OpenBR project has produced a new language for image recognition used to express algorithms. Each word in the language corresponds to a plugin that performs a specific transformation on an image, allowing for highly decoupled development of the individual steps in an algorithm. The OpenBR 0.4.0 framework (Open Source Biometric Recognition) and related APIs apply complex algorithms to measure facial features and give access control using advanced biometrics. The C++ plugins include Face Recognition, Age Estimation, and Gender Estimation. OpenBR is written in a subset of C++ and is known to work with all popular modern C++ compilers. The project is actively maintained on Windows, Mac, and Linux, with ports to Android & iOS.

Name: Famo.us
Desc: Famo.us is an open source JavaScript framework for mobile applications. The best known feature of Famo.us is its rendering engine and 3D physics engine that can render to DOM, Canvas or WebGL. Developers can take advantage of the rendering and physics engine to build native speed apps and games in HTML5. Famo.us runs on iOS, Android, Kindle and Firefox devices and integrates with Angular, Backbone, Meteor and Facebook React.

Name: Google Data APIs .NET SDK
Desc: This .NET SDK provides easy access to the Google Data APIs. It supports services like YouTube, Google Calendar, and Contacts. The Google Data APIs use the AtomPub protocol to read and write data to Google Services. Services supported include Google Calendar, Contacts, YouTube and more. This is a reference to a Google Code project.

Name: Node IMDB API
Desc: Node IMDB API is a Node.js interface to the Unofficial IMDB API. It provides developers with a non-scraping method for getting information from IMDB.

Name: DocuSign Mobile SDK
Desc: The DocuSign Mobile SDK for iOS allows developers to integrate Digital Transaction Management services and eSignature functionality into mobile apps. With the SDK, developers can implement functionality such as signing and completing document-based transactions as well as hosting in-person signing sessions from within a mobile app.

Name: Crafted.Twitter
Desc: Crafted.Twitter is compromised of an ASP .Net web form and MVC HTMLhelper extension to help developers implement tweets on their website.

Name: Zend Framework 2
Desc: Zend Framework 2 is an open source object oriented framework for developing web applications in PHP 5. Zend Framework uses many of the new features of PHP 5.3, including namespaces, late static binding, lambda functions and closures.

Name: Spring.NET Social Extension for Twitter
Desc: Spring Application Framework provides connection support and API binding for Twitter.

Name: Tonic
Desc: Tonic is an open-source RESTful web App PHP micro-framework. Features include URI annotations, support for content and language negotiation, method conditions and mount points.

Name: ASP Twitter
Desc: Simple ASP code library supporting the Twitter API v 1.1

Name: Recess
Desc: Recess is a RESTful, full-stack PHP framework designed to support both experienced and beginning developers. Its small footprint makes it a good choice for LAMP development. Recess is designed for PHP 5 and uses a loosely coupled Model-View Controller.

Name: Epiphany
Desc: Epiphany is a micro PHP framework meant to be clean and RESTful. It is designed to be simple yet powerful.

Name: FRAPI
Desc: FRAPI is an API Open Source RESTful API Framework consisting of two specific parts: The administration interface and the public API. It is designed to let developers focus on business logic and not the frontend presentation layer.

Name: Spring Social Core
Desc: Includes Spring Social's core service provider connect framework and web support.

Name: iOS Twitter Framework
Desc: The Twitter iOS framework provides developers with framework examples for iOS5+ and iOS6+

Name: 140dev Twitter Framework
Desc: The 140dev Twitter Framework is a free source code library containing a Twitter database server for gathering tweets for selected keywords, as well as a display plugin that lets you show tweets from the database in a single line of PHP code.

Name: Twilio Client for Zend Framework
Desc: Zend Framework based client for the Twilio API. Still in the first stages of development. Expect things to change. The example code should remain relatively stable, but there are no guarantees.

Name: Facebook.NET: Open Source for Facebook
Desc: An overview and introduction to an open source project, Facebook.NET, a framework optimized for developing ASP.NET-based Facebook applications.
